snippet: A federal court on Monday reversed its demand that the Veterans Affairs Department overhaul its mental health care system.
abstract: Federal appeals court reverses earlier demand that the Veterans Affairs Department overhaul its mental health care system, saying that any such changes need to be ordered by Congress or the president.
lead_paragraph: A federal court on Monday reversed its demand that the Veterans Affairs Department overhaul its mental health care system.

headline.main: California: Call for Veterans Agency Fixes Is Reversed
headline.print_headline: California: Call For Veterans Agency Fixes Is Reversed
